name: Mashinky
description: Mashinky is a transport strategy game about trains. The goal is to create your own transport empire on a procedurally generated map. It’s a unique blend of realistic graphics combined with an isometric construction mode and board game-like rules.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 750 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core 2.66 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
